overview: This program features then-newcomer Sandy Duncan in her first network  television special. Only a few years after being passed over by Gene Kelly for a role in Hello Dolly, Duncan's star had ascended so far so fast that he was now her special guest star. Paul Lynde is also featured in a campy version of "Bad, Bad Leroy Brown".
tagline: 1974 TV Special showcasing the talents of triple threat, Sandy Duncan.
title: The Sandy Duncan Special
